scripts.der: npm run push && git ls-remote --tags --refs origin | cut -f2 | xargs git push origin --delete
scripts.build: ncc build index.js --license licenses.txt && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.local: ncc build index.js --license licenses.txt && git add .
scripts.tags: git tag -a -m " v$npm_package_version automated deployment $npm_package_time" v$npm_package_version  && git push --follow-tags
scripts.push: git pull && npm run local && npm run del && npm run tags
scripts.sample: echo hello $npm_package_author_name, your commut is complete
